alert.note: Alert for Halifax; Warren (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 10:30PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Warren and northwestern Halifax Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 1030 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Warrenton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Roanoke Rapids, Warrenton, Norlina, Littleton, Macon, Rosemary, Wise, Lake Gaston, Southpointe And Morningstar Marinas and Roanoke Rapids Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
